channel.title: Client Troubles?
channel.description:
I've been using a Blank Client from Serguru/Serguruscape, to test my 317 changes. Of course, it's kind of annoying. ^^"
I was wondering a few things: -How do I change the IP it connects to for my server? (Not the 120.000.001 or whatever, to my IP; epicarrowscape.no-ip.biz.) -How can I change the background on it? It just says BLANK CLIENT right now, and that's pointless to me. ^^"
If I can't change those things, does anyone have a tutorial I can try for making my own? I'm not sure on how I would go about making my own client.

item.title: Client Troubles?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Thanks. ^^[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2009, 07:28:43 am[/size][hr]Nvm - I changed it but it still says Connecting to Server; 120.000.01 :\ (or whatever. I never get it right)

Read full topic

item.title: Client Troubles?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

To change the ip go to the client folder and open EGUI.java. And change it to your server ip.

Read full topic
